title: UFC on ESPN+ 19: Official scorecards from Tampa
text:
Check out the official scorecards from all 14 fights at UFC on ESPN+ 19 at Amalie Arena in Tampa, Fla. (Gallery will be updated throughout the event.)

J.J. Aldrich (8-3 MMA, 4-2 UFC) def. Lauren Mueller (5-3 MMA, 1-3 UFC) via unanimous decision

Marvin Vettori (14-3-1 MMA, 4-2-1 UFC) def. Andrew Sanchez (11-5 MMA, 4-3 UFC) via unanimous decision

Miguel Baeza (8-0 MMA, 1-0 UFC) def. Hector Aldana (4-3 MMA, 0-3 UFC) via TKO

Marlon Vera (17-5-1 MMA, 9-4 UFC) def. Andre Ewell (15-6 MMA, 2-2 UFC) via TKO

Deiveson Figueiredo (17-1 MMA, 6-1 UFC) def. Tim Elliott (15-9-1 MMA, 4-7 UFC) via submission
description: Check out the official scorecards from all 14 fights at UFC on ESPN+ 19 at Amalie Arena in Tampa, Fla.
